update.description:
This adds support for Heightmaps with DART when using Bullet or ODE collision detectors in DART. It requires changes in [DART PR #1069](https://github.com/dartsim/dart/pull/1069).

Fixes issue #909.

One thing worth noting: While I was working on this I found that collision with heightmaps in Bullet is actually not working at the moment. The terrain is not at the right place. I’ve added a test world [heightmap\_test\_with\_with\_boxes.world](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2956/wip-dart-heightmap-with-bullet-and-ode/diff#chg-test/worlds/heightmap_test_with_boxes.world) with this PR which can be used to see this.  
 I think this issue is due to the [MotionState::setWorldTransform\(\)](https://bitbucket.org/JenniferBuehler/gazebo/pull-requests/new?source=dart_heightmap_with_bullet&t=1#Lgazebo/physics/bullet/BulletHeightmapShape.ccF98T110) not actually doing anything with the parameter \(bullet’s terrain has to be translated, see also comment in [btHeightfieldTerrainShape](https://github.com/bulletphysics/bullet3/blob/ab4b6638002c86d7d0c5d4a1b8e5728a227a92e3/src/BulletCollision/CollisionShapes/btHeightfieldTerrainShape.h#L44)\).  
 This issue needs to be investigated, but I feel this is a separate issue which should have its own PR.   
 I will shortly add a test which confirms this with a failure for bullet. Until then this is still marked as WIP.
update.title: WIP: Dart heightmap with bullet and ODE

pull_request.title: Dart heightmap with bullet and ODE

pullrequest.title: Dart heightmap with bullet and ODE

content.raw: We should think how to handle this, it would be good if the user could switch between the collision detectors used in DART. So I think we should make this a parameter. Perhaps in the SDF `<physics><dart>`?
content.html: We should think how to handle this, it would be good if the user could switch between the collision detectors used in DART. So I think we should make this a parameter. Perhaps in the SDF <physics><dart>?

update.description:
This adds support for Heightmaps with DART when using Bullet or ODE collision detectors in DART. It requires changes in [DART PR #1069](https://github.com/dartsim/dart/pull/1069).

One thing worth noting: While I was working on this I found that collision with heightmaps in Bullet is actually not working at the moment. The terrain is not at the right place. I’ve added a test world \`\`heightmap\_test\_with\_with\_boxes.world\`\` with this PR which can be used to see this.  
I think this issue is due to the [MotionState::setWorldTransform\(\)](https://bitbucket.org/JenniferBuehler/gazebo/pull-requests/new?source=dart_heightmap_with_bullet&t=1#Lgazebo/physics/bullet/BulletHeightmapShape.ccF98T110) not actually doing anything with the parameter \(bullet’s terrain has to be translated, see also comment in [btHeightfieldTerrainShape](https://github.com/bulletphysics/bullet3/blob/ab4b6638002c86d7d0c5d4a1b8e5728a227a92e3/src/BulletCollision/CollisionShapes/btHeightfieldTerrainShape.h#L44)\).  
This issue needs to be investigated, but I feel this is a separate issue which should have its own PR.   
 I will shortly add a test which confirms this with a failure for bullet. Until then this is still marked as WIP.

pull_request.title: Dart heightmap with bullet and ODE

pullrequest.title: Dart heightmap with bullet and ODE

content.raw: I think that this transform still requires the addition of minHeight. At least it was required like this for DART, so it should probably be the same here too. At the moment it can’t be tested because the transform \`\`tr\`\` actually has no effect.
content.html: I think that this transform still requires the addition of minHeight. At least it was required like this for DART, so it should probably be the same here too. At the moment it can’t be tested because the transform ``tr`` actually has no effect.

pull_request.title: Dart heightmap with bullet and ODE

update.description:
This adds support for Heightmaps with DART when using Bullet or ODE collision detectors in DART. It requires changes in [DART PR #1069](https://github.com/dartsim/dart/pull/1069). 

One thing worth noting: While I was working on this I found that collision with heightmaps in Bullet is actually not working at the moment. I think this is due to the [MotionState::setWorldTransform\(\)](https://bitbucket.org/JenniferBuehler/gazebo/pull-requests/new?source=dart_heightmap_with_bullet&t=1#Lgazebo/physics/bullet/BulletHeightmapShape.ccF98T110) not actually doing anything with the parameter \(bullet’s terrain has to be translated to match the pose of the same ODE terrain\). This needs to be investigated, but I feel this is a separate issue which should have its own PR.   
I will shortly add a test which confirms this with a  failure for bullet. Until then this is still marked as WIP.
update.title: WIP: Dart heightmap with bullet and ODE
